name: Ajs Nigrutin
description:
'''Vladan Aksentijević''' ({{lang-sr-Cyrl|Владан Аксентијевић}}; born 12 August 1977), better known by his stage name '''Ajs Nigrutin''', is a Serbian rapper, actor and singer.

Known for his nasal [[baritone]] vocals, comedic lyrical style and eccentric stage presence, Nigrutin rose to continental prominence as the member of the Belgrade-based recording act [[Bad Copy]]. Parallel to his work in Bad Copy, he maintains a successful solo career. He is the recipient of numerous accolades, including three Serbian Oscars of Popularity, two Melko Awards and an [[Indexi (award)|Indexi Award]].{{citation needed|date=May 2021}} He writes inspiring and motivational texts through intriguing metaphors, humor, and eccentric voices.
